quote: There have been times in Life when my light has been extinguished and the smoldering embers of it were blown back into flame by another. I give deepest Thanks to all that have rekindled my light.
quote_letters: THERE HAVE BEEN TIMES IN LIFE WHEN MY LIGHT HAS BEEN EXTINGUISHED AND THE SMOLDERING EMBERS OF IT WERE BLOWN BACK INTO FLAME BY ANOTHER I GIVE DEEPEST THANKS TO ALL THAT HAVE REKINDLED MY LIGHT
